markings:
LR, stamp in red,: ATÉLIER ED. DEGAS  | Lugt 657 |

provenance: Atélier Degas, Lugt 657, Paris (until 1917); Succession Ed. Degas, Lugt 658 bis. [Sagot-Le Garrec, Paris, until 1925; sold to MIA]
title: Four Studies of a Baby's Head
